arts.ttl: Odogu Gives Wolfsburg Hope After Another Defeat
arts.sum: VfL Wolfsburg lost their third consecutive game on Sunday with a 1-0 defeat away to Union Berlin. However, 18 year-old defender, David Odogu raised spirits with an impressive debut for…

arts.ttl: Bundesliga Player Ratings | Wolfsburg Tamed by Iron of Union Berlin
arts.sum: Union Berlin moved one step closer to Bundesliga safety with a hard-fought 1-0 win at home to Wolfsburg thanks to a Benedict Hollerbach volley. Story of the match With results…

arts.ttl: 1. FC Union Berlin vs. VfL Wolfsburg preview: Eight-point separation in capital clash
arts.sum: VfL Wolfsburg (10-8-9, 12th) look to avoid their third consecutive defeat as they visit 1. FC Union Berlin (8-6-13, 13th), eight points behind but unbeaten in three matches.

arts.ttl: Sunday's Bundesliga predictions including Union Berlin vs. Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Union Berlin vs. Wolfsburg.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg interested in signing Everton target Habib Diarra
arts.sum: According to Sacha Tavolieri, VfL Wolfsburg are interested in a move for Habib Diarra (21) from Strasbourg in the summer transfer window. The midfielder has impressed under the management of Liam…

arts.ttl: Huge injury problems in Wolfsburg's defense
arts.sum: While many clubs have had injury problems this season, Wolfsburg current ones could barely get much worse - coach Ralph Hasenhüttl gives an update.
